irobots.behaviour

Class JustDriveBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • irobots.behaviour.JustDriveBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior

    public class JustDriveBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements lejos.robotics.subsumption.Behavior
    This behavior will make the robot go forward if it is idle and no other behaviors take control over the robot. This behavior can be used to let the robot explore the field if no other action has to be done.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JustDriveBehaviour() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action()
      Causes the robot to go forward until another behavior takes over.
      void suppress()
      Suppresses this behavior.
      boolean takeControl()
      Always returns true because this behavior does not have a certain trigger but is a behavior which can be executed when the robot is idle.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
